nodes.text: Moraj was a heroic captain who was a local hero to the first settlers of the Bestine Township.
The first settlers and founders of the Bestine Township erected a memorial with the writing of—"in memory of brave Captain Moraj".

Moraj was actually Nathan "Moraj_Markinnison" Larkins, a member of The Crescent Order, and one of the first beta testers of the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies, who had died in a tragic car accident. In the game, a memorial was placed in his memory, providing a brief description of Captain Moraj.

During the launch of Star Wars Galaxies, players would receive Maroj melons, a type of food to help players get started. This melon was yet another tribute to Nathan Larkins. However, the the name Maroj is a slight variation of Moraj.
